remarks: The difference of two group sums.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsumsub.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumsub.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumsub.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
gsumsub.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
gsumsub.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumsub.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumsub.h $e |- ( ph -> H : A --> B ) $.
gsumsub.fn $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumsub.hn $e |- ( ph -> H finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumsub $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F oF .- H ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .- ( G gsum H ) ) ) $.
